name: Mihaela van der Schaar-Mitrea
content: The van der Schaar Lab: Machine learning and AI for medicine // van der Schaar Lab Search LinkedInTwitterYouTubeGitHub The van der Schaar Lab: Machine learning and AI for medicineJoin our lab!The van der Schaar lab is a world-leading research group led by Mihaela van der Schaar, John Humphrey Plummer Professor of Machine Learning, AI and Medicine at the University of Cambridge.We develop cutting-edge machine learning & AI theory and methods, with the goal of developing Reality-Centric AI.Does this sound interesting? We are looking for four outstanding machine learning PhD students to join our elite group at the University of Cambridge!Recent posts November 10, 2025 van der Schaar Lab at NeurIPS 2025: Explained November 10, 2025 October 29, 2025 2025 Open House October 29, 2025 October 15, 2025 Prof. Mihaela van der Schaar contributes to Nature Biotechnology Q&A on digital twins October 15, 2025 October 10, 2025 Celebrating our 2025 PhD graduates!
